description.en: The course gives an overview of children's literature theory and the developmental history of Estonian children's literature and journalism. A selection of the most prominent texts in Estonian children's literature is introduced via lectures, seminars and independent work.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate lastekirjanduse teooriast ning eesti lastekirjanduse ja -ajakirjanduse arenguloost. Kursuse õppematerjalide lugemise ja iseseisva tööga tutvutakse valikuga eesti lastekirjanduse silmapaistvamatest tekstidest.

objectives.en: 1) get acquainted with the basic concepts of children's literature theory;
2) to teach to understand the specifics of children's literature;
3) to get acquainted with the development stages of children's literature, the most important Estonian children's writers and works.
objectives.et: 3) tutvuda eesti lastekirjanduse arenguetappidega, olulisemate eesti lastekirjanike ja nende teostega.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) knows the specifics of children's literature;
2) knows the development stages of Estonian children's literature and the most important Estonian children's writers;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) teab eesti lastekirjanduse arenguetappe ja olulisemaid eesti lastekirjanikke;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) is familiar with contemporary Estonian children's literature;
4) is familiar with contemporary Estonian children's press;
5) knows how to stimulate reading in children and to use children's literature in the teacher's daily work.
learning_outcomes.et: 5) teab, kuidas äratada lastes lugemishuvi ja kasutada lastekirjandust õpetaja igapäevatöös.
